282084B8.Line7.8C8E3: He spends his days in a cloud of smoke at the riverbank. It’s dangerous there, be careful.

5A431858.Line1.8C8F8: Wait... what about the old man?

6340F7E1.VoiceDir3.8C8E3: Offended. Your assistant just suggested the most stupid idea ever.

8E2C0B36.Line5.8C8E3: ...but if you’re desperate, he may be the only one crazy enough to agree.

C94C7E85.VoiceDir1.8C8F8: A sudden thought hits you out of the blue, but you're not sure it's a good idea...

F43791B4.Line3.8C8E3: What? Better to ask the dark sorcerer for a quick death!

FD357163.VoiceDir5.8C8E3: but its the only idea you have
